item.title: About me
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: I’m a backend developer in Drivies, former developer at intelligenia. I’m passioante about learning new things and testing new technologies. Apart from work, I like jogging, history and reading books. This blog does not reflect the views of present, past or future employers.
